title: How to Get a Taurus Man to Chase You

steps.title: Taurus men need reassurance before they start making bolder moves.
steps.content: Taurus men need reassurance before they start making bolder moves. They can be shy and want to avoid rejection—to the point that they may not do anything until they know where you stand. Making the first move can be nerve-wracking, but it’s well worth the effort. Give your Taurus man a little security in the knowledge that his advances won’t be turned down, and he’ll take it from there. [1] X Research source Taurus men aren’t turned on by behavior they perceive as pushy or needy . Instead, be honest and keep it simple so that he gets the message and feels more comfortable pursuing you. You could say, “I really like you, and I’m willing to take it slow. No pressure—I just enjoy spending time with you.” You could also just ask him out and keep the date fairly uncomplicated. “Would you like to grab a coffee with me this weekend? I’d love to hang out with you and chat.”

steps.title: Show him that you like him by giving him sincere compliments.
steps.content: Show him that you like him by giving him sincere compliments . [2] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. Taurus men are honest to a fault and very good at sensing when other people aren’t, so pay him real, heartfelt compliments that express what you find appealing about him. This is a great way to reassure him that his feelings are returned and get him thinking about how best to chase you. Personalize your compliments as much as you can. A great compliment is specific to the person receiving it! You could say, “That shirt looks amazing on you! You have a great sense of style.” Taurus men also pride themselves on being stable, dependable people. Tell him, “You’re the most reliable person I know, and I appreciate that!” Taurus men may be slow to show emotion, but they love to pay compliments to people they’re interested in. Once he knows that you like him, he’ll be quick to tell you about all the reasons that he likes you, too.

steps.title: Give your Taurus man a challenge and show him your mysterious side.
steps.content: Give your Taurus man a challenge and show him your mysterious side. He’ll find it more enticing to chase someone whose availability is limited , and it’ll make him feel special when you choose to spend time with him. Make plans with other friends, focus on your hobbies, and tell him just enough about them to make him hungry for more details in the future. Taureans are straightforward and plain-spoken, and mind games are not their forte, so there’s no need to take it any further than this. A little mystery is great, but be honest if he asks how you feel about him. Reader Poll: We asked 1534 wikiHow readers who've dated Taurus men, and 56% of them agreed that the best way to approach them is by giving them space and waiting for them to reach out. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Taurus men enjoy elegance and quality when it comes to fashion.
steps.content: Taurus men enjoy elegance and quality when it comes to fashion. He’s not looking for the most flashy or revealing outfits; he’ll be most attracted to someone who wears flattering clothes and leaves something to the imagination. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. When you plan your outfits , make sure they give you a neat, tidy appearance and highlight your favorite features. [4] X Research source Because Taureans are ruled by Venus (the planet of beauty), they generally have quite the adept fashion sense. Use clothing to express yourself around him! For a more feminine look, you could wear a flowy skirt or comfortable dress. For a more masculine look, you could throw a nicer sweater on over your regular clothes. Use a lot of earthy tones: greens, blues, and beiges will be pleasing to your Taurus man’s eye. Taurus men are extremely sensual, so indulge his other senses. Wear a distinct perfume or cologne that he can associate with you when he smells it.

steps.title: Texting
steps.content: Texting is a great way to keep his thoughts centered on you. Whether you’ve already told him that you like him or you’re still working up to it, sending him thoughtful messages will make him feel good about your relationship and tempt him to chase you more. Text him every two to three days (unless he’s already texting you more often) to let him know how much you care. [5] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. For example, text him: “Hey! I’ve been thinking of you today :)” You could also slip in a compliment. “How’s work going today? I admire your work ethic a lot, you know!” The key is to show him that you want him to chase you without seeming like you need it too badly, as neediness will make him uneasy. It’s especially important to text him after you spend time together, or he may think you didn’t have a good time. Let him know that you enjoyed seeing him and look forward to doing it again.

steps.title: Taurus men secretly enjoy being treated to gifts and affection!
steps.content: Taurus men secretly enjoy being treated to gifts and affection! When you give him a gift, remember that doesn’t need to be flashy or expensive. Make his favorite meal for him, or grab him a coffee made the way he likes it. Taurus men enjoy the finer things, but the best kind of gift is one that shows how well you know him and how much you’ve paid attention to the details of his life. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. When in doubt, win a Taurus man over through his stomach. Gourmet chocolates, fine wines, and meals from his favorite restaurant are the way to go. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Your Taurus man needs to see that you’re confident, with and without him.
steps.content: Your Taurus man needs to see that you’re confident, with and without him. Confidence and independence are two traits that Taurus men find hard to resist! If you can stand your ground, assert yourself in a way that is both firm and kind, and generally show him that you know your value, he’ll quickly recognize your value too. When you make decisions, be resolute and stand by them to appear confident. Try not to overthink; if you’re deciding what to do for a date, just pick the thing you think you’d both enjoy and have a good time. Show off your financial savvy, too. Taurus men work hard so that they can make good money and find success. He’ll admire you if you’re financially independent (or have a plan and are working towards it). This is another reason to keep yourself busy and invest in your hobbies when trying to get a Taurus man’s attention: he’ll see this as evidence of your independence and be more interested in pursuing you.

steps.title: Taurus men work hard to meet their goals and take pride in that fact.
steps.content: Taurus men work hard to meet their goals and take pride in that fact. Listen to him when he tells you about his passions and his struggles, and let him know that you’re always ready to cheer him on or help him if he asks. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. By showing him that you can be a consistent, dependable source of support in his life, you’re also showing him that you’re relationship material—and he’ll be eager to chase you. [9] X Research source Start routines together since Taurus men love them. Make a standing date for the two of you to walk to your favorite coffee shop together on Saturdays, or go for a run in the mornings. Taurus men can often be workaholics. If you see him overworking himself, ask him to stay away and grab dinner with you to unwind; he’ll see how much you care about his wellbeing.

steps.title: Taurus men need to feel comfortable around the person they like.
steps.content: Taurus men need to feel comfortable around the person they like. They also love getting to know potential romantic interests, and will often try to learn all about you before getting invested and chasing you. As such, you'll want to indulge his questions and let him see the real you . Taurus men take time to open up and will appreciate your willingness to do it first . When you’re vulnerable with him, it will show your Taurus man that he can let his guard down enough to be vulnerable with you, too. Sometimes, the “getting to know you” phase of a relationship can feel like an interview with a Taurus man. Remember that he’s not trying to be mean; he just wants to make sure that you two are a good match.

steps.title: Taurus men are loyal creatures—and look for it in their partners, too.
steps.content: Taurus men are loyal creatures—and look for it in their partners, too. It’s not hard to show him that you’re loyal and earn his trust : simply follow through on your promises and treat him with kindness. Once he feels that he can trust you and that you care for him exactly as he is, he will want to chase you and deepen your relationship. This is where playing hard-to-get can backfire. He’ll enjoy the challenge of wooing someone who is less available, but taking it further by trying to provoke jealousy may drive him away. For example, flirting with other people won’t make him more interested. Because your Taurus man can be insecure over romance, it will just make him question whether you like him or not.

steps.title: For a Taurus man to chase you, he needs space to do it comfortably.
steps.content: For a Taurus man to chase you, he needs space to do it comfortably. Taurus men don’t typically do "love at first sight." They take relationships one step at a time and wait until they’re sure before making a move. [10] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. The decision to chase you has to be his, and he won't be forced or rushed into it. So give him time to think, and show him how much you care; soon enough, he’ll come knocking.
